title: South Africa : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: Overall Number of internet users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2020 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2020 and 2021.
Maximum Number of internet users in millions, about 49.0 was reported at Year 2023
Minimum Number of internet users in millions about 41.9 was reached at Year 2020
min_summary: In general Number of internet users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2020 to 2023.
